casebody.data:
Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith, Inc., Appellee, v. Stark et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner & Smith, Inc. v. Stark (1992), 65 Ohio St.3d 312.]

(No. 91-2106 — Submitted November 9, 1992 — Decided December 14, 1992.) Kohrman, Jackson & Krantz, Byron S. Krantz and Joshua R. Cohen, for appellee. Al Dahling, for appellants.

This cause is affirmed on authority of Sekeres v. Arbaugh (1987), 31 Ohio St.3d 24, 31 OBR 75, 508 N.E.2d 941.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes and Douglas, JJ., concur. Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., dissent.
